articles.description: Sawalha voiced the lead character of Ginger in the original film from 2000, but the role will now be recast for the sequel.

articles.title: Kanye West talks drug addiction, the death penalty and religion on series of new freestyles - NME
articles.description: Kanye West has delivered a series of freestyles that discuss drug addiction, the death penalty, and religion, and reference the Kardashians and Trump.
articles.content:
Kanye West has delivered a series of freestyles that discuss drug addiction, the death penalty, religion and more.
